questions_and_notes: The temperature of snow is undefined in snow-free portions of a cell, so the cell_methods should be "where snow" (not "where land").   this however includes snow on sea_ice so requiress a parenthetical qualifier in the "where" directive.  Should snow on sea-ice really be excluded?
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 3 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
comment: Temperature of the snow surface as it interacts with the atmosphere, averaged over a grid cell.
